original_text: The God who lives for ever has spoken to us from the middle of the fire. Has anyone ever heard him speak like that and then continued to live?
korean_text: 육신을 가진 자로서 우리처럼 살아 계시는 하나님의 음성이 불 가운데에서 발함을 듣고 생존한 자가 누구니이까

sentences.original_text: The God who lives for ever
from the middle of the fire
Has anyone ever heard him speak like that
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그처럼 그분께서 말씀하시는 것을 들었는가
